000000  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
000002  b083              SUB      sp,sp,#0xc
000004  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;44       WM_LOCK();
000006  f7fffffe          BL       GUI_Lock
;;;45       WM__CHWinModal.hWin = hWin;
00000a  480d              LDR      r0,|L1.64|
00000c  8084              STRH     r4,[r0,#4]
;;;46       /* Send a message to the window that it is no longer pressed (WM_TOUCH(0)) 
;;;47          if it is outside the modal area, because otherwise it will not receive this message any more.
;;;48       */
;;;49       if (WM__CHWinLast.hWin) {
00000e  4d0d              LDR      r5,|L1.68|
000010  88a8              LDRH     r0,[r5,#4]  ; WM__CHWinLast
000012  b178              CBZ      r0,|L1.52|
;;;50         if (!WM__IsInModalArea(WM__CHWinLast.hWin)) {
000014  f9b50004          LDRSH    r0,[r5,#4]  ; WM__CHWinLast
000018  f7fffffe          BL       WM__IsInModalArea
00001c  b950              CBNZ     r0,|L1.52|
;;;51           WM_MESSAGE Msg = {0};
00001e  2400              MOVS     r4,#0
000020  9401              STR      r4,[sp,#4]
000022  9402              STR      r4,[sp,#8]
;;;52           Msg.MsgId = WM_TOUCH;
000024  200c              MOVS     r0,#0xc
000026  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
;;;53           WM__SendPIDMessage(WM__CHWinLast.hWin, &Msg);
000028  f9b50004          LDRSH    r0,[r5,#4]  ; WM__CHWinLast
00002c  4669              MOV      r1,sp
00002e  f7fffffe          BL       WM__SendPIDMessage
;;;54           WM__CHWinLast.hWin = 0;
000032  80ac              STRH     r4,[r5,#4]
                  |L1.52|
;;;55         } 
;;;56       }
;;;57       WM_UNLOCK();
000034  b003              ADD      sp,sp,#0xc
000036  e8bd4030          POP      {r4,r5,lr}
00003a  f7ffbffe          B.W      GUI_Unlock
;;;58     }
;;;59     
                          ENDP

00003e  0000              DCW      0x0000
